org.pmedv.pojos.forums
Class Posting

java.lang.Object
  org.pmedv.pojos.forums.Posting
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Posting>
public class Posting
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Posting>

This class represents a posting inside a specific thread. Every thread can have an unlimited number of postings written by the users.

Author:
Matthias Pueski
See Also:
